title: The Legislative Assembly of Nagaland (Change in Representation) Act, 1968
description: Amends the composition and representation in the Nagaland Legislative Assembly.

title: The Reserve Bank (Transfer to Public Ownership) Act, 1948
description: Transferred ownership of the Reserve Bank of India to the Government of India.

title: The Tribunals Reforms Act, 2021
description: Amends laws related to the structure and functioning of tribunals in India.

title: The Industrial Development Bank (Transfer of Undertaking and Repeal) Act, 2003
description: Transfers the undertaking of the Industrial Development Bank and repeals the original act.

title: The Prohibition of Child Marriage Act, 2006
description: Amends previous legislation to strengthen prohibition of child marriage.

title: The Prevention of Cruelty to Animals Act, 1960
description: Updates regulations and penalties for the prevention of cruelty to animals.

title: The Charitable Endowments Act, 1890
description: Amends provisions regulating management and control of charitable endowments.

title: The Anti-Apartheid (United Nations Convention) Act, 1981
description: Implements UN conventions against apartheid and related sanctions.

title: The Jammu and Kashmir Reorganisation Act, 2019
description: Amends previous territorial laws for reorganisation into two Union Territories.

title: The African Development Fund Act, 1982
description: Updates India's participation and contributions to the African Development Fund.

title: The African Development Bank Act, 1983
description: Amends legislation regarding India's membership and investment in the African Development Bank.

title: The International Development Association (Status, Immunities and Privileges) Act, 1960
description: Grants immunities, privileges, and legal status to IDA operations in India.

title: The North-Eastern Areas (Reorganisation) Act, 1971
description: Amends previous laws for reorganisation of north-eastern states of India.

title: The Repealing and Amending Act, 2016
description: Repeals obsolete laws and amends existing statutes for legal clarity.

title: The Public Sector Iron and Steel Companies (Restructuring) and Miscellaneous Provisions Act, 1978
description: Provides for restructuring and regulation of public sector iron and steel companies.

title: The Orphanages and other Charitable Homes (Supervision and Control) Act, 1960
description: Amends provisions for supervision and control of orphanages and charitable homes.

title: The Indian Forest Act, 1927
description: Amends forest law provisions relating to conservation, management, and use of forest resources.

title: The Apprentices Act, 1961
description: Updates provisions regarding training, employment, and regulation of apprentices.

title: The Revenue Recovery Act, 1890
description: Amends rules for recovery of public revenues and arrears from defaulters.

title: The Indian Veterinary Council Act, 1984
description: Updates regulations governing veterinary education, practice, and professional standards.

title: The Compensatory Afforestation Fund Act, 2016
description: Amends provisions for compensatory afforestation funds and their management.

title: The Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara Land Development Act, 1948
description: Updates land development regulations and authorities in Delhi and Ajmer-Merwara.

title: The State of Mizoram Act, 1986
description: Amends laws related to the formation and administration of Mizoram as a state.

title: The British India Corporation Limited (Acquisition of Shares) Act, 1981
description: Amends provisions regarding government acquisition of shares in the British India Corporation.

title: The Bombay Reorganisation Act, 1960
description: Amends laws for reorganisation of Bombay state into Maharashtra and Gujarat.

title: The Anti-Hijacking Act, 2016
description: Updates penalties and procedures for aircraft hijacking offenses.

title: The National Bank for Financing Infrastructure and Development Act, 2021
description: Amends provisions regarding financing infrastructure projects in India.

title: The Maternity Benefit Act, 1961
description: Updates regulations for maternity benefits, leave, and employment protections for women.

title: The State of Arunachal Pradesh Act, 1986
description: Amends laws regarding the formation and administration of Arunachal Pradesh as a state.

title: The Regional Rural Banks Act, 1976
description: Updates provisions governing the establishment and operation of regional rural banks.

title: The Hotel-Receipts Tax Act, 1980
description: Amends provisions for taxation on receipts of hotels and hospitality establishments.

title: The Visva-Bharati Act, 1951
description: Updates governance and administration provisions of Visva-Bharati University.

title: The Central Sales Tax Act, 1956
description: Amends rules for levy, collection, and regulation of central sales tax.

title: The Patents Act, 1970
description: Updates provisions related to patent rights, filing, and enforcement.

title: The Andhra Pradesh Reorganisation Act, 2014
description: Amends laws governing the bifurcation of Andhra Pradesh and formation of Telangana.

title: The Central Excise Act, 1944
description: Updates provisions for levy, collection, and regulation of central excise duties.

title: The Chemical Weapons Convention Act, 2000
description: Amends regulations to comply with international chemical weapons treaties and enforcement.

title: The Indira Gandhi National Tribal University Act, 2007
description: Updates governance and administration of Indira Gandhi National Tribal University.

title: The Dr. Rajendra Prasad Central Agricultural University Act, 2016
description: Amends rules for governance, administration, and academic functioning of the university.

title: The Geneva Conventions Act, 1960
description: Updates national enforcement provisions related to the Geneva Conventions on humanitarian law.

title: The Companies Act, 2013
description: Amends provisions related to corporate governance, company registration, and compliance.

title: The Income-tax Act, 1961
description: Updates rules for levy, collection, and regulation of income tax in India.
